title: Gold team LF adc
body:
Hello I'm Cronenberg, we are looking for an ADC for a gold flex team. 

Rules:

1) You must have Discord and a working microphone of, at least, decent quality. If we can't hear you during game, you will not get very far with us.

2) DO NOT APPLY IF YOUR HIGHER THAN GOLD (Only looking for people at gold and maybe high silver, we will be doing LCS type leagues so plat and above won't be allowed to play with gold)

3) No smurfs needed or wanted

4) its a gold team , we love to play competitive and like to tryhard, we will learn and grow together as much as we can.

5) Main your role.

Team practices are Mondays, Wednesdays, and Thursdays - 8:15PM Eastern (NA) times. Attendance is required at least 10 minutes before the start of practice. Failure to do so will result in warnings and/or kicks from the team. It's a game, games are fun, we get that, but this is a competitive team and practices are meant for focus on development and growth as a team and as individual players.

Tryouts at 8:15 PM Est

Please fill out the questionnaire below, and good luck!

Your name/What you prefer to be called: Isaac
Your summoner name: Mr Otter
Your Rank: S2
Your Role: ADC
Your top-five champion pool: Trist, Ashe, Varus, Ezreal, Jhin
Can you make our schedule reliably: Yes
Do you have any prior experience in teams? If so, explain: Yes I was in a team sort of like what you guys explain. Atmasphere we competed in LCS like tourneys that were streamed on twitch. 
How often do you rage/tilt in your games: Rarely ever. 
Your greatest strength: I come with a lot of in game knowledge as I have been playing since the end of season 1. I have a very good sense of humor and I know a lot about all the champions in the game and I am always able to help people.
Your greatest weakness: I can sometimes over commit to things. I have been working on this alot. And another one is that I may play too much and spam ranked when I am tired, frustrated, etc. 
What would you bring to the team: Lots of knowledge about the game. I am pretty shy at the beginning but once i get to know everyone I am a very funny and joking person.
Why do you want to join a team: I feel like I play a lot better in a team environment where everyone is on the same page. and A lot of the ADC's I like to play are usually better on a coordinated team as they are more utility based and team reliant.



Also I have been gold for the previous seasons I peaked at gold 1 last season and I have been working very hard to get my ranking back this season but have taken a step back to learn alot of things that I didnt know about the game before I start going hard at ranked again. I feel like I am more prepared than ever.

Do you have any prior experience in teams? If so, explain: Yes been on teams since season 1. Though they disbanded now. 
How often do you rage/tilt in your games: Never. I lack emotions to the point my friends just think that I'm a 100% Kuudere kind of person. 
Your greatest strength: Game knowledge, Adaptability, Team Work, Sacrificial pawn(support only). 
Your greatest weakness: Thinking too much may prolong my attacks. Overthinking can sometimes hold me back. 
What would you bring to the team: A player that wont betray other's trust and that would stick their neck in the game to both destroy the enemy and keep others alive. 
Why do you want to join a team: Looking for more Coop-experience like. Used to be a lone wolf since Season 1 most of the time, despite having teams, and due lack of friends that play now I search for a new group to gain a place I can call 'home' while exploring team fights in LoL.
